Package com.SDD.utility

Class Utility

java.lang.Object
com.SDD.utility.Utility
public abstract class Utility extends Object
A utility class providing methods for manipulating arrays of Segment objects.

    static Segment

    Returns a new Segment object that is the opposite of the specified segment.
